title: Why for the love of god why ohh why in promos do i only get afks and DCS in promos?
body:
i just dropped to 58 lp because our adc with all the kills decided to go afk so why? only in promos? is this done on purpose???? please rito explain/.?? 

can a red pleasee explain to me this is something fishy going on here???? so please explain to me............

please this is driving me crazy... your game is  not healthyyy is this done on purpose/???

been playing for so longg and dont you fucking tell me im wronggggggg please. ive played for 2 long to see this pattern

replies.body: You only get AFK's? Good for you, I get all sorts of shit that makes me lose.
S O L O  Q U E U E  B O Y S

Yeah i see this a lot in the low elo and notice that people who find out your in your promos will be harsher to you if they don't like you or feel they were wrong.  

You need to remember that this game was built only for those people and how dare you play the game with them lol,  teenage mentality is very poor.

What you need to do is practice and keep playing.  I just won my promos series with our top laner never even connecting which forced us to 4 v 5, so it can be done.  Remember computer games were not made to be easy and this game pages you to the limits. It's why this game has a huge sport factor compared to something like mine sweeper.  

Hang in there and keep practicing.  Also afk now is auto banned. Had it ban me for a rage quit. 

Have fun.

Havok
